getImage

public static java.awt.Image getImage(java.lang.String filename,
                                      boolean waitForImageToLoad)
Load and return image found in filename. Image format types supported are AWT types (GIF, JPG) and the X Windows XPM type.

Parameters:
filename - location of the image
waitForImageToLoad - true if load is synchronous
Returns:
Image found in filename
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if Invalid XPM image filename

getImage

public static java.awt.Image getImage(byte[] imageData,
                                      boolean waitForImageToLoad)
Load and return image found in imageData. Image format types supported are AWT types (GIF, JPG) and the X Windows XPM type. This method fails for JDK 1.4.2 or later

Parameters:
imageData - binary data of the image
waitForImageToLoad - true if load is synchronous
Returns:
Image found in filename
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if Invalid XPM image filename

Get subset area of the given Image.

Parameters:

x - the sub-area x coordinate
y - the sub-area y coordinate
width - the width of the sub-area
height - the height of the sub-area
Returns:
